short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blurs WhatsApp chats until hovered, with password protection and chat hiding

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your WhatsApp Web experience with a one-in-all extension that provides you with advanced features to protect your data and maintain your privacy. 

ChatGuard For WhatsApp Web - includes - blur chat, hide chat, and more. ChatGuard For WhatsApp Web offers an extension that allows users to blur and hide chats from your WhatsApp web. 

Begin with installation and then set a password to blur and hide chats to maintain the privacy of your personal chats. 

Once, you set the password, a drop-down list appears. Enable the attributes as per your wish and requirements.   

Enabling the Blur Chat option blurs all the chats. Even if you open any particular chat it stays blurred as well. To reveal the message, the only option is to hover your mouse cursor on it.

It also allows users to hide the specific chats. It doesn’t blur but completely, vanishes away the chats from the entire WhatsApp web application. It won’t even appear after searching the same number or contact name as hidden. 

To hide or unhide WhatsApp Web chats you are required to enter the password. And, if you forget the password you'll have to uninstall the extension. It allows you to hide multiple chats at once with the help of keywords. For instance, suppose you want to hide all the chats of your office colleagues and you have saved everyone's contact with the same prefix using the company’s name. Just enter the company’s name and then hit the “select all” button for multiple. 

The most advantageous feature is that it shows a number over the icon on the extension bar. This number describes the total contacts or chats that have been hidden in the WhatsApp web application.

Unlike others, It has so many advanced features to provide WhatsApp Web lock for the web. Also, this extension doesn’t acquire any of your information or messages. It can easily be adapted as per your needs and requirements.

Features:
Blurs All the Messages: Blurs all the chats and to read the message hover the cursor over it.

Hides Selected Chats:  It allows users to hide specific chats and to maintain privacy it won’t appear even after entering the same contact query.

Password Oriented: To hide or unhide the chats you need to enter the password. You can read hidden chats only after unhiding that particular chat.

Hides in Bulk:  It allows users to hide more than one chat at a single time with a few clicks.
Shows no of Hidden Chats: At extension bar, over the icon, total number of hidden chats appears.
